Description.Text: Location This city hotel is located just 100 m from the yellow line 3 of the underground network (Rogoredo), which offers easy and convenient access to Milan's many impressive sights. The mighty Milan Cathedral, the famous La Scala opera house, the world-famous Last Supper by Leonardo da Vinci and San Siro football stadium are amongst the tourist highlights. Countless boutiques of Italian designers may be browsed and there are many restaurants, bars and clubs located within walking distance of Facilities The air-conditioned hotel comprises a total of 26 rooms. Most of the storeys can be reached by lift. A safe, a bar and room service are available to guests of the accommodation. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. The rooms have a double bed or a king-size bed. Little extras, including internet access, a telephone and a TV, contribute to a great stay. The accommodation units include a bathroom with a shower. A hairdryer is also available. Meals Breakfast can be booked. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, JCB and MasterCard.

This city hotel is located just 100 m from the yellow line 3 of the underground network (Rogoredo), which offers easy and convenient access to Milan's many impressive sights. The mighty Milan Cathedral, the famous La Scala opera house, the world-famous Last Supper by Leonardo da Vinci and San Siro football stadium are amongst the tourist highlights. Countless boutiques of Italian designers may be browsed and there are many restaurants, bars and clubs located within walking distance of

Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. The rooms have a double bed or a king-size bed. Little extras, including internet access, a telephone and a TV, contribute to a great stay. The accommodation units include a bathroom with a shower. A hairdryer is also available.

The air-conditioned hotel comprises a total of 26 rooms. Most of the storeys can be reached by lift. A safe, a bar and room service are available to guests of the accommodation. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment.
The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, JCB and MasterCard.
